The Professor AI is an AI-powered academic accelerator designed to transform passive reading into active mastery. Don't just read your notes—interrogate them. Upload lectures, PDFs, or slides, and the Professor will generate interactive exams, Tutoring sessions, and flashcards instantly. Featuring "Nightmare Mode" for deep understanding and "The Syndicate" for multiplayer study battles, it is the ultimate tool for students who refuse to be average.


Developer - William Popoola
Version - 1.0
Build - HTML5

Features:

  • AI Exam Generator: Instantly create quizzes from PDF/DOCX/Images.
  • "Professor Mode" explains complex topics using analogies (E.g., Sports, pop culture).
  • The Syndicate: Multiplayer study duels to challenge friends.
  • Nightmare Difficulty: Edge-case questions designed to trick you and deepen retention.
  • Active Recall: "Lock-In" mode with special psychological techniques to enhance learning.

System Requirements:

  • Web: Modern Browser (Chrome, Safari, Edge, Firefox) with JavaScript enabled. Mobile: Android 10+ (Chrome) or iOS 15+ (Safari) for PWA installation. 
  • Hardware: A Device with a camera recommended for scanning features.

Enter a heated multiplayer match of hide-and-seek. A fast-paced, strategic cat-and-mouse battle of one Alien against three Marines. 

Play as the Alien, outwitting the Marines by laying eggs, slinking through shadows, and employing cunning maneuvers. As you attempt to break items and grow stronger, every action matters against the clock. 

Or become a Marine and use guns, teamwork, and items to hunt the Alien. Find hidden spawns, destroy eggs, and survive long enough to win.

With its pixel art arenas, AI bots, and multiplayer matches, the game offers action, strategy, and stealth.

The hunt is on!

Developer - Adam Stepinski
Version - 1.0.77
Build - Android
Audience - 7+

Features:

  • Asymmetrical multiplayer hide-and-seek gameplay featuring one Alien versus three Marines
  • Fast-paced, time-based matches focused on stealth, strategy, and survival
  • Dual-role gameplay allows players to hunt as Marines or outwit enemies as the Alien
  • Pixel art arenas designed for tactical movement, shadows, and ambushes
  • Multiplayer matches with AI bot support for practice and full games

System Requirements:

  • OS: Android 6.0+
  • Storage: 104 MB available space

title.$t: The Pizza Knight Saves The Princess

content.$t:
The Pizza Knight Saves The Princess is a fantasy-comedy choose-your-own-adventure-style visual novel with hand-drawn art & set in a world where everything & everyone is made of food. You play as the Pizza Knight, a gallant but somewhat bumbling knight who is sent to rescue his love interest the Water Ice Princess, who's been kidnapped by the Chocolate Count. On arrival at the Count's castle, the Knight encounters the Cotton Candy Fairy, who tells him that the only way to survive the Count's gumbot army is to consume one of twelve magical pizza toppings. Choose your topping, choose your battles, and be careful, and you won't just save the Water Ice Princess, you'll also solve the mysteries of the Sivinkors Empire and discover who you really are.

Developer - Dragon's Den Studios
Version - 1.0
Build - Windows, Apple
Also available on Itch

Features:

  • The link to the site includes both the demo & the full release. Downloading the demo is FREE while the full version COSTS $1.50.
  • This game is recommended for a 12+ audience due to cartoon violence and some frightening scenes that younger viewers may be sensitive to. People between the ages of 6-12 should only play this game in the company of an adult, and people under the age of 6 shouldn't be playing this game at all.

Screenshots:







Trailer:



Download:

link.title: The Pizza Knight Saves The Princess

content.$t:
This is a cube cutting game. Cut the cube along one of its axes. After each cut, keep the longer portion and continue cutting. The more cuts, the better. Stop cutting when the remaining portion is shorter than a certain length. There are bonus points for cutting out very short portions. The highlighted line in the center of the screen indicates the cutting position. Missing the cut will cost you one mistake point. The game fails if you use up all mistake points or don't meet the required number of cuts. After passing a level, you will earn diamonds. Collecting a certain number of diamonds will automatically unlock the corresponding skin. 

With simple controls, infinite fun can be achieved, making it ideal for brief entertainment and relaxation during fragmented time. 

Just simple taps of your fingers can bring endless fun. Come and give it a try! 

https://3fun.itch.io/cube-cutting
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=cn.LincLab.CubeCutting

Developer - ChenFeng
Version - 1.02
Build - Android

  • Easy to play
  • Multi-language support.
  • Vivid and colorful backgrounds.
  • Various beautiful skins.

Inspired by the SCP Foundation's SCP-027 ("The Vermin God"), Vermin God is an insect horror multi-path visual novel where your choices matter. 
In this game, you make choices based on the information and various story elements you gather and your previous choices' outcomes. Every choice truly matters as the narrative is carefully crafted to produce an immersive interactive horror experience in the visual novel medium that hasn't been done before.

Developer - Neuroticfly Studio
Version - 1.94
Build - Android 5+, Windows 7

Randy & Manilla



Randy & Manilla is a game which is discovered in a mysterious quantum cyber-universe hosted by Net-Cubes that contains virtual worlds with various genres of games. A strange kind of virtual environment with the inspiration of Wreck-It Ralph in a later post-apocalyptic era to Ready Player One.

Keyboard & Mouse controls:

  • Mouse: *Rotate camera/ship *(For the Net-Cubes Worldmap, move the cursor to the center of the screen to orient and then smootly move to change direction).
  •  Left Mouse Button: Press Button/Turn camera/Shoot fire/Start ship
  •  X/Z/E/R: Kick/Glitch-port/Shoot fire/Breaking
  • Middle mouse button: Zoom - Brake ship
  • Arrow button or WASD:   Move ship/character
  •  Space: Jump/ Next dialogue
  •  Left/Right mouse button:  Dialogues
  •  Esc: Pause Menu
  •  C: Jump automatic dialogs 
  • V: Change Ship controls/Talk Manilla/Randy
  • Q: Restore camera 
  • Left shift Talk fast/ Run
  • R/F: Throttle/Brake ship

Support this project on:

  • Indiegogo: https://igg.me/at/randyandmanilla/x/22731077#/
  • Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/ofihombre
  • Ko-Fi: https://ko-fi.com/ofihombre
  • uTip: https://utip.io/ofihombre/shop

Are you are developer, and want to help ofihombre with his project?

Follow ofihombre on:

  • Contact me from my email: alex9monfort@gmail.com
  • Or with an invitation on my Discord server: https://discord.gg/UyacSFF
  • Official Website: https://randyandmanilla.weebly.com/

Developer - Ofihombre Studios
Version - 2nd Beta
Build - Windows

Features:

  • Fixed the camera of the first levels
  • fixed the camera drift from Xbox gamepads
  • 4 new levels
  • qdata previews

Screenshots:




Gameplay Video:

Manilla makes an adventure in Pocket Wonder's net cube, it's like in Wonder Race, only everything is in 2D and in a minimalist side-scroller. Overcome the obstacles and collect the data as quickly as possible until you reach your goal. This game is an experimental project made on the Pocket Platformer engine, based on the game in development "Randy & Manilla". 

How to play:

Required browsers to play: Mozilla Firefox & Chromium (Chrome, Edge, Opera, Brave, etc.) · Left/Right arrow buttons: move (two times: acceleration) · 
Up arrow button: jump/talk · 
X key button: dash · 
Escape button: pause menu · 
Enter: restart (Only in results screen) · 
Download only (IMPORTANT INFORMATION!): Does the Download Work for you?  Please, check out the Pop-up blocker & Web settings from the browser. 
Randy & Manilla page link: https://ofihombre.itch.io/randy-manilla 
Pocket Plafformer link: https://the-l0bster.itch.io/pocket-platformer 
Soundtrack by Marcus Wood: https://bandcamp.com/randymanilla

content.$t:
Goodbye Time Traveler is a very heart-driven time-travel game.

Meet the weirdly nameless main character. A 21 years old college student living a boring pathetic life except for the fact that he is cursed with a strange phenomenon. A phenomenon that causes him to ''Time skip'' in time with no memories of what happened ...

Discover the horrible truth of the universe, fight for what you consider ''the right thing'' ...

Whether you guide the world to salvation or destruction is all up to you...

Only ''You'' can decide the fate of the world and every world and timeline out there ...

Music - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BZsXcc_tC-o

Randy has been trapped in the Net-Cube of Sokobanland. Beat all 48 levels by collecting the Memory Qdatas in the area by moving the boxes, collecting net points, or getting the power coins to break the cracked bricks.

This game is a spin-off from the upcoming game Randy & Manilla, and it was made in less than one day with Nes Puzzle Maker.

Randy & Manilla page link: https://ofihombre.itch.io/randy-manilla 
Nes Puzzle Maker link: https://puzzle.nes.science/home

How to play
You need to download NES emulators (like Jnes, Mesen, .etc) and open the .nes rom to play. 
Jnes: http://www.jabosoft.com/categories/1 
Mesen: https://www.mesen.ca/ 
iNES: https://fms.komkon.org/iNES/

NOTE: Press the "space" button if you get stuck when playing online.


Developer - Ofihombre Studios
Version - 1.0    
Build - Android, Windows

  • NES Homebrew
  • Playable with NES Emulators
  • Cross-Platform

Alkanzo
Android, Apps, Paid, Productivity, SAAS, Trial, Windows, Mac, Linux.


    Do you have to attend several online meetings per day as part of your work or studies? 

    Do you find it annoying to open or search for the calendar tab among numerous other tabs in your browser multiple times per day just to make sure that you don't miss any meetings? 

    And at the times when you are attending a meeting and you realize that you are running late for the next meeting, do you feel that it's too much hassle to find the attendees on your chat and send the message that you are running late for the next meeting? 

    Alkanzo app can help you here. 

     Have peace of mind at joining online meetings. Get a quick overview of upcoming meetings on the desktop. Instantly join meetings through timely notifications. When running late for a meeting, inform attendees via Slack or Email from the Alkanzo app.

Developer - Akazila Inc.
Build - Windows, Mac, Linux

Features:

  • Get a quick overview of upcoming meetings on your desktop.
  • Instantly join meetings through timely notifications.
  • Inform attendees via Slack or Email when running late for a meeting.
  • Get benefits of the app's availability on multiple operating systems.
  • Instantly join meetings on Google Meet, Microsoft Teams, Zoom, Webex, BlueJeans, etc.
  • connects with Google Calendar and Microsoft Outlook Calendar.

GameZop (Play & Win)

Gamezop is a destination for Indian users to earn real money by playing games.

Gamezop has hundreds of free real money games where users can play and win Paytm cash (Paytm money) instantly. So, get paid to play games! Play to win money!


Developer -  Gamezop
Version - 1
Build - Android
Official website - https://www.gamezop.com

Features:

  • Free cricket games to make money.
  • Free ludo games to win cash.
  • Free racing games to earn money.
  • Football games to win Paytm cash.
  • Live trivia games to get cash.
  • Free pool games to make money.

How it works:

Gamezop is only for users from India. You have to enter your Paytm number to login. Once you have logged in, you will find a number of live tournaments for real money games. Participate in any live tournament (championship), play unlimited times during the tournament (championship), make high scores, and win real money (real cash)!

Several free games are made available everyday. Some games will require tokens or cash as entry fees. You can earn tokens (coins) by participating in Spin the Wheel (Spin to Win), Refer and Earn (Refer to Earn), enabling push notifications, and completing your profile.

New users can earn a lot of free tokens (free coins) from Spin the Wheel (Spin to Win). Refer and Earn (Refer to Earn) is another great way for users to make unlimited cash and tokens (coins) from Gamezop. There is a one attempt that users get everyday for Spin the Wheel (Spin to Win) in order to earn tokens (coins) and bonus money. Refer and Earn (Refer to Earn) has no restriction and users can win unlimited Paytm cash (Paytm money) and unlimited bonus tokens by inviting their friends to join Gamezop.

Users can win real money (real cash) by playing free games and token games. Your winning amount can be withdrawn to Paytm. Your winning amount can also be used to play premium games that require cash as entry fees (money games). Users can win big cash prizes from playing money games with lesser competition. For new users, money games also award bonus cash prizes in addition to real money from making high scores in games. Real money won from money games can be withdrawn instantly to Paytm. Games khelo paise jeeto!
